tool.name: Remove GATE SpaceToken v1.0.0
tool.description: Removes SpaceToken annotations from the input.
tool.help:
Some (non-GATE) processors get confused by GATE's SpaceToken annotations. This tool can be used to remove the SpaceToken annotations before processing.
**NOTE** This tools works on LIF containers, so be sure to convert the GATE XML to a LIF container before running this tool.
